job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Azure GenAI DevOps Engineer

The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very high-level and lacks specific technical details about tasks or technologies. While it mentions AI solutions and a team of data scientists and ML professionals, it doesn't provide enough concrete information to classify it as an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on improving business operations and customer experience through technical solutions.

phrases.phrase: deliver maximum value with our AI solutions
phrases.justification: This highlights the goal of ensuring AI solutions contribute effectively to business objectives.

phrases.phrase: a small group of software and machine learning professionals
phrases.justification: Mentions the presence of software professionals, implying software development is part of the team's activities.
The job title explicitly includes 'DevOps Engineer' and 'GenAI', strongly suggesting a focus on operational aspects of GenAI.
